TITLE: 【Request】] Completion


# Request Completion

This issue records the result of the request.
It should be completed by the implementation AI and reviewed by a human before closing.


## 1. Summary
- Brief overview of what was done

## 2. Result
- Changes made
- Relevant PR links

## 3. Verification
- How was the result verified?
- Success condition confirmation

## 4. Evaluation (By Implementation AI)
- Was anything more complex than expected?
- Were there unexpected constraints?
- Technical trade-offs

## 5. Improvement Ideas (By Implementation AI)
- What could be improved next time?
- Areas for refactoring or design cleanup

## Notes
